message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to stay within my budget.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. This offer reflects the product's true value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,000, but that's the maximum I can offer. Can you consider this price?
